name: Sale
tagline: We would like to sell some furniture.
body:
### Welcome to our Zurich Enge Sale.
All larger items are for pick-up form Zurich Enge (fairly close to the train station: https://goo.gl/maps/8jhfaC19jSw). I can help you move them, but please tell me in advance what your plans are. I may consider posting smaller items to you.

<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d10810.433242872752!2d8.52301473149258!3d47.36104466506878!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x479009fb928b3bd5%3A0x9938ffc5153c7a8e!2zRW5nZSwgWsO8cmljaA!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sch!4v1447233052476" width="400" height="300" frameborder="0" style="border:0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

#### Contact
You can contact Chris @zurich-enge under zurich.enge(at)gmail.com if you are interested to acquire any of the following listed items.

### [**RESERVED** for NR] Freezer (Tiefkühlschrank) ~ 150 CHF
![](http://media.kieskeurig.nl/images/00/93/07/c0/ab9a/4ced/a692/9edda0fa5ca8/600x600.jpg)
#### LG Freezer (GC 154 GQW)
- Original price: 600 CHF
- Volume: 100L
- Energy rating: A+

### [**RESERVED** for MD] Wine fridge (Weinklimaschrank) ~ 95 CHF
![](http://media.deindeal.ch/upload/300_weinkuhlschrank4.jpg)
#### Kybernetik S28
- Original price: 350 CHF
- Fassungsvermögen: 65 Liter = 28 Flaschen
- Abmessungen: 722 x 463 x 542mm
- Gewicht: 19,5 kg
- Gehäuse: Stahl, schwarz lackiert
- Anzahl Tablare: 6
- Thermostat: 12-18 °C
- Funktionsweise: Thermoelektrisch
- Leistungsaufnahme: 70 W
- Spannung: 230 V
- Türe: Glas mit schwarzem Rahmen

### 42" TV Monitor ~ 250 CHF
![](http://i2.expansys.com/img/b/201155/lg-37le5300-37-inch-1080p-hd-led-tv.jpg)
#### LG LE 5300
- Original price: 1000 CHF
- LED Display (106cm, 42”)
- Full HD (1080p @ 100Hz)
- 4 x HDMI, USB
- http://www.lg.com/uk/tvs/lg-42LE5300-led-tv

### TV / Bluetooth Soundbar ~ 150 CHF
![](http://www.englishforum.ch/attachments/items-sale/90066d1414840487-soundbar-philips-htl5120-d-ttingen-ag-img_2963.jpg)
#### Philips HTL5120
- Original price: 300 CHF
- Bluetooth
- HDMI In/Out (passthrough)
- Digital Audio Input
- Detects if wall-mounted

- pull-out bed (convertible to bed for 2 people)
- Color: black
- Material: Synthetic Leather (MDF) (Sitzflächenfüllung: Schaumstoff) Sprungfedern Füsse: verchromtes Metall
￼- Dimensions: max. Breite: 262 cm, Tiefe: 212 cm, Höhe: 84 cm, Bett: 120 x 218 cm
- Weight: 80 kg (2 Komponenten)
